english.response: On February 18, 1972, the UAE was officially proclaimed a federation with Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan as its first president, and he served in that role until his death in 2004.

arabic.response: في 18 فبراير 1972، أعلنت الإمارات العربية المتحدة رسمياً Federation واصلت سيدة الإمارة الشقيقة إلى بعد ذلك.
